and the associated crimes at meetings were processed by the police state security of the in the "investigation group quer" set up for this purpose. a political motivation was recognizable in more than half of the investigations.

the pmk links rose by %. here, too, we work with case-related priorities & investigative teams. for calls or appointments to or planning criminal offenses in the digital space, we also draw on external expertise for the internet evaluation.

the pmk rechts records the highest level in years, including a % increase in xenophobic crimes.we are strengthening investigations with more staff, case-based investigative teams and .and we are planning a central office against crime.
with the recent increase in the total volume of politically motivated crime to casesthis is by far the highest number of cases since .it is all the more depressing that it is only the bright field.

the already perfidious trick found a new form through . under the legend of a family member suffering from in financial need, victims were persuaded to hand over monetary values. perpetrators have stolen almost million from of crimes they have completed.

fraud offenses in general fell slightly.however, since , the "corona investigation group" has conducted almost investigations into fraud to obtain emergency corona aid.the intended amount of damage amounts to more than million.

the majority of violations of the infection control measures are due to the obligation to wear a mouth and nose cover.in addition, since september , procedures for falsified certificates to exempt from this obligation have been initiated.

with a view to the large number of drug delivery services, the "messenger investigation group" was set up in february . she has already cleared up gang structures, confiscated kilos of narcotics and around half a million euros in cash and obtained arrest warrants.

the increase in narcotics cases is virtually home-made due to increased controls.in addition to consumer cases, % more cases of illegal trade in & drug smuggling detected - cases that we also generate through the & enlighten.

there was an increase in theft from/from vehicles. license plates were the most frequently stolen, followed by items found in or left behind in the vehicle, such as smartphones, bags and tools. this is where we start preventively.

the decline in (-11.2%) is partly reflected in the increase in (+15.1%). here, too, reasons can be found in the presence of people in the apartments due to the pandemic. criminals attacked basements more often and burglaries were also discovered more often.

in the st alone, pickpocketing fell by more than %, and theft from businesses/guest rooms by more than %. restricted border traffic, closed bars, fewer people and tourists reduced the opportunities for the perpetrators, most of whom traveled.

in some areas of theft, there has been a significant decrease, while in others there has been an increase.possible reasons for this are changes in the structure of crime opportunities caused by the pandemic and, as a result, limited opportunities to sell crime loot.

the past year was in many ways a demanding, difficult & stressful year for emergency workers.with investigations into resistance and physical assault on law enforcement officers, the highest number since was reached in .

the robberies decreased in their entirety. opportunities for handbag snatching, shop robberies or robbery attacks on drivers were limited due to the pandemic - closed shops, less passenger traffic & taxi rides.robbery in apartments increased.

during the lockdown, the number of cases went more partnership & family violence against children, the stakes increased.that makes you keen.the limited police insight into families quickly shows us our limits, but we keep track of every suspected case.

& increase opportunities for and make police prevention work in schools more difficult - e.g. to chats with (child) pornographic content.therefore, we had to find alternative ways of prevention and go.

we were able to increase the clear-up rate for sexual offenses & identify more suspects.but the goal in the fight against must be to prevent acts, empower victims of sexual violence, support & to give them trust, to confide in them.
last year, cases of murder and manslaughter were registered - more than half are attempts. the number of cases themselves has fallen by %, and at % almost every (attempted) homicide is solved.

overall, the crimes in are slightly declining. the and the associated containment and infection protection measures for have of course had an impact on crime opportunities, reporting behavior, control measures & thus had an effect on individual crime fields.

we act with a sense of proportion and always seek dialogue first. we do not tolerate intentional violations. a look at our deployment statistics, as of :30 a.m.:more than reports of not wearing a mouth and nose cover and/or suspected forgery of a certificate.

for all meetings today there is a requirement to wear a mouth and nose cover. this is currently far too poorly adhered to. that urgently needs to change. to this end, we regularly address the demo participants, including with loudspeaker trucks.
for the meeting on march square, there is also the possibility of using part of june street. please make use of this, keep the necessary distance from each other and wear a mouth and nose cover.

the scammers act very professionally. also and especially if you have become a victim or you know someone who could be a victim, do not hesitate to report them. our professionals from are at your side.
the scammers contact people en masse via social media or dating portals, establish contact, very convincingly pretend their love and use the emotional dependency for rip-offs.

can you think of someone who is just falling into such a trap or is already in the middle of it? this person needs your help because they probably won't be able to get out of this on their own. these scammers are very persuasive and do a lot of damage - in an emotional & financially
